description: Master Rob is disgusted by his Ava who has trouble remembering her place. He knows only one way to get her back in line. Ava squirms as her hogtied body is splashed with wax, but this just the beginning. It takes a lot to annoy Rob, but Ava has accomplished it for the last time. Will Master Rob end this session with some loving touches or will Ava be pushed beyond her limits in this film – Training Ava!
title: Training Ava: Ava Mir-Ausziehen, Master Rob Gadling
